{"language":"python","parent":["import sqlite3

dbname = 'TEST.db'
conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
cur = conn.cursor()

","# データの編集
cur.execute('UPDATE person SET name = "Fujiwara", age = 69, gender = "Woman" WHERE id = 1')","

conn.commit()

cur.close()
conn.close()"],"caption":[]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"例えば、personテーブルの任意のidの行のデータを任意の値で編集するには以下のようなコードとなります。","href":null}]}

{"icon":{"type":"external","external":{"url":"https://www.notion.so/icons/code_gray.svg"}},"color":"default_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"personテーブルを任意の値で、任意のidの行のデータを編集する","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import sqlite3

dbname = 'TEST.db'
conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
cur = conn.cursor()

","# 任意の値を入れる
name = "Tanaka"
age = 89
gender = "Man"
target_id = 1

# データの編集
cur.execute('UPDATE person SET name = ?, age = ?, gender = ? WHERE id = ?',(name, age, gender, target_id))","

conn.commit()

cur.close()
conn.close()"],"caption":[]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"このコードで、personテーブルの任意のidの行のデータを、任意の値で編集できます。","href":null}]}
